com.jde.view.sprites

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.view.sprites.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    This Animation class is a list of sprites and durations, in order to draw an animated sprite
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

      Current frame number

      Elapsed time since the animation started
      protected int loopFrom
      Number of the frame to come back when looping

      List of sprites or "frames"
